A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What an awful movie. Terrible plot; ridiculous depiction of TWO militaries for something calling itself Star Wars; Mary Sue characters abound; worse love story than Attack of the Clones; wooden acting; worst Star Wars dialogue ever (and that's saying something). There's more\, but I would rather forget about this movie after suffering through it. It's really unwatchable garbage. Do yourself a favor: if you haven't seen this\, don't.
